details.description: A gentle yoga class designed for seniors to improve flexibility and reduce stress. No prior experience required. Mats and equipment will be provided.
Join us for a lively discussion on classic literature. This month's book is 'Pride and Prejudice' by Jane Austen. New members are always welcome!
Learn the basics of gardening and how to grow your own vegetables and flowers. This hands-on workshop is perfect for beginners and seasoned gardeners alike.
Explore your creative side with our painting class. All materials will be provided, and no prior experience is needed. Come and create your own masterpiece!
Enjoy a night of classic cinema with friends. This month's feature is 'Casablanca'. Popcorn and refreshments will be provided.
